project.title: Chat System
project.content: Chat Hut is the basic version of the chat System is built using the Java programming language with core concepts like Multithreading, Server-Client architecture, JDBC

project.title: Weather App
project.content: Weather App integrates a Weather API, allowing users to check real-time weather reports by simply entering a city name. It features a user-friendly interface for seamless and intuitive access to weather data.

project.title: Tic-Tac-Toe Game
project.content: I developed a Tic Tac Toe game using React, featuring an interactive and responsive UI for a smooth gaming experience. It includes dynamic state management and real-time updates for seamless gameplay.

project.title: ToDo-List
project.content: I built a To-Do List app using React, allowing users to efficiently add, edit, and delete tasks with a clean and intuitive interface. It features real-time state updates for seamless task management.
